SEARCH
Module org.redsox.lancastersfx
Package org.redsox.lancastersfx.core

Class Kitchen

java.lang.Object
org.redsox.lancastersfx.core.Kitchen
public class Kitchen extends Object
The Kitchen class represents the kitchen of a restaurant. It manages orders, inventory, and recipe-related operations.

    • reviewRecipe

      public void reviewRecipe(int recipeID)
      Reviews a recipe with the specified ID. This method retrieves the recipe details and gets a response from the chef.
      Parameters:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe to review
